name: Dream (itch) (Whare Mātoro (Otago Games Space))
description:
A surreal 2D platformer and exploration game about finding objects for a giant teddy bear so that you can escape your dream.

Created by Hinako MacMaster and Shaquille Berwick during a 3 week 'Game Jam' Elective at Otago Polytechnic (2022).

Supported by tutors: Lisa Blakie and Josiah Hunt.
